questions.question: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

answers.answer: As I'm retired, I'll give a part of it to my son to enable it to carry out a major project he wants to achive.

For the rest as I do like travel, I would like visit the regions of the world I haven't seen, as the Brazil and the Argentina and also, most of all the states of the US that i don't yet visited. And also, once more go back to San Fransisco.
So, if you have on million euros... I'm therefore
